title: Loading in game sivir bug
body: Everytime i play sivir. when i am trying to load into the rift, my screen goes black and i cant load into the game. For this i got a 5 game ban plz someone respond :){{champion:15}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

If this only happens when you play Sivir, something could be up with the assets for that champion.

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), this will redownload any corrupted files (This may take a lengthy period of time to scan for corrupted files, please allow it to run to completion).
